Choose one. If this spell was cast from anywhere other than your hand, choose both instead.
• Create two 1/1 white Soldier creature tokens.
• Creatures you control get +1/+0 and gain haste until end of turn.
Flashback {2}{R}{W} [i](You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)[/i]
